movie_title: Our love of pets ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: Why do we keep, and love, pets? Neil and Georgie discuss this and teach you some useful vocabulary.

vocabulary.definition: shy or reserved, focusing more on internal thoughts and feelings than on external stimulation
vocabulary.example: She's quite introverted and prefers spending time alone with her books.

vocabulary.definition: quality of being resolutely or dutifully firm and unwavering
vocabulary.example: His steadfastness in supporting his friend during difficult times was admirable.

vocabulary.definition: originating in or characteristic of a distant foreign country, strikingly unusual or strange
vocabulary.example: The zoo had a collection of exotic animals from tropical regions around the world.

vocabulary.definition: to admire or love someone greatly or excessively
vocabulary.example: Many teenagers tend to idolize their favorite celebrities.

vocabulary.definition: a person or animal with whom one spends a lot of time or with whom one travels
vocabulary.example: My dog is not just a pet, but a loyal companion who always stays by my side.

vocabulary.definition: becoming popular or generating a lot of interest on social media or the internet
vocabulary.example: The new fashion style is trending among young adults on various social media platforms.
